attributes.action: improve transport  and infrastructure for Bath
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
- Connecting the A46 / A36. Work towards creating an orbital dual carriageway with a link towards Bristol, eventually connecting with the A4174.
- Reviving the road tunnels under Bath project. 
- Install trams and monorails around the city and into the suburbs.
- Ban HGV's from entering Bath via London Road/Cleveland Place and Sydney.
- Build a new trunk road / motorway from M4 Junction 17 to Southampton.
- Connect the A4 "Globe Roundabout" to the A431 Kelston Road, in order to relieve traffic pressure on residential areas around the Royal United Hospital.
- Bypass Saltford (A4).
- Build a new "A" road to Bristol Airport, relieving the villages in the Chew valley.
- Dual carriageway part of the A46 south of Junction 18 of the M4.
- Create a parallel  "A" Road to the A46 from A4 "Globe Roundabout" towards Wick and onto Junction 18 of the M4.
- Ensure there are more petrol stations around Bath. There is now only one petrol station in BA1 - London Road.
- Expand Residential parking zones 
- Ensure Park and Rides open 7 days a week and are free to city of Bath residents.
